sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs"> <x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <definition>The SSO is statutorily required under DoD 5105.21-M-1, and allows participation in and conduct of projects at the Sensitive Compartmented Information (SCI) level.</definition> <number>GWBS0001541</number> <parent_task/> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-25 15:59:56</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3b158176db91a3008e9357935e9619c6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-25 16:36:04</sys_updated_on> <task_code>5.1.8.1</task_code> <task_name>5.1.8.1 Special Security Office (SSO) Operations</task_name> <task_title>Special Security Office (SSO) Operations</task_title> </x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs> </record_update>
